input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product features and product title.

Product title:
81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag College Work City Casual Everyday Messenger Bag

Product features:
Dimensions: H 24cm, W 32cm, D 8cm. Adjustable strap length 143cm with buckle closure.
100% genuine goat leather which ages gracefully and softens with use. brand new bag may also have a distinctive leather smell which will fade with 4-6 weeks of regular use.
Flap over closure with buckle closure. 3 inner compartments and 2 inner zipped pocket, as well 2 external pockets with press studs.
Weight 650g.
This unique bag suitable for carrying iPad, festival day out, dinner, business meeting, everyday use.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: If you're looking for a unique and stylish bag that is perfect for carrying your iPad, then look no further! This 81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag College Work City Casual Everyday Messenger Bag is made from 100% genuine goat leather, so you know it's high quality and will last for years. The adjustable strap length of 143cm and flap over closure with buckle closure make it easy to carry, while the 3 inner compartments and 2 inner zipped pockets provide plenty of space for all your essentials. This bag also has 2 external pockets with press studs, so you can easily access your belongings. And don't worry about the weight, this bag weighs only 650g, so it's perfect for everyday use. With its unique design and high quality materials, this bag is perfect for those who want a stylish and functional way to carry their iPad and other essentials.
input_text.Response B: The 81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag is made from 100% genuine goat leather and features a flap over closure with buckle closure, 3 inner compartments, 2 inner zipped pockets, 2 external pockets, and an adjustable strap with buckle closure. This versatile bag is ideal for use as a work bag, casual bag, or everyday bag, and can be used to carry an iPad or other essentials for a day out or business meeting.
